name: MenuPublisher 4 WP
author: Medienmacher GmbH

sections.description:
This plugin can be used, to display lunch and menus, that a gastronomer
enters on MenuPublisher.de.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/menupublisher-4-wp directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Correct the access rights of the plugin folder, the apache user must have read and write access. (You can orient yourself on the access rights of other plugins)
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  4. Use the Settings->MenuPublisher 4 WP screen to configure the plugin, you will need to enter a RestaurantCode and add at least one code snippet
  5. Add the code snippet on your page with the MenuPublisher 4 WP button of the rich text editor
sections.faq:
Where do I find the RestaurantCode

You need to be the gastronomer, who enters the dishes on MenuPublisher.de. Login on
MenuPublisher,
then go to Distribution -> Homepage and search there for RestaurantCode

short_description: This is a plugin, that renders lunch and menus from MenuPublisher
description:
This plugin can be used, to display lunch and menus, that a gastronomer
enters on MenuPublisher.de.

upgrade_notice.1.1: If you have a week info defined on your lunch card but get [object Object] output on your website, then this update corrects this problem.
